Text: Just a tip to folks wanting a dub in good quality -- take these and then get translated MKV (this specific type since they have no spammy watermarks and the subtitles can be turned off) and then play the audio for cheater71's low quality video while playing the high quality video for the subbed MKV files with subtitles turned off.  The last few ones from cheater71 had Omakes though which I appreciate as a lot of editions don't have them.

I've been following Cheater71 for a really long time, from this name to the other account and back to this name again. I have never had a problem with quality of video or audio. Thank you cheater71 for providing us with your FREE uploads.
